p: Furthermore, PKC inclusion in broiler chickens’ diets improved the relative weights of immune organs and enhanced humoral immunity [ 66]. On the contrary, results obtained by Alshelmani et al. [ 17, 35] showed that the inclusion of more than 10% untreated PKC in broiler diet might have adverse effects on birds’ performance. These contradictory results may be contributed to the oil extraction methods from palm fruits, which led to the differences in its composition. The findings obtained by Zanu et al. [ 60] showed that layers could utilize PKC based diet better (up to 5 and 10% inclusion) without any adverse effects on their production. In contrast, the egg production was adversely affected consequent to 15% PKC supplementation.
